Title: Enacts the "employment first choice act" to ensure that an individual with developmental disabilities in a nonintegrated setting shall have the right to remain in such a setting under certain circumstances
Summary: Enacts the "employment first choice act" to ensure that an individual with developmental disabilities in a nonintegrated setting shall have the right to remain in such a setting under certain circumstances.
LawCode: Add ยง16.02, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to directing the commissioner of developmental disabilities to establish a procedure through which persons with developmental disabilities may choose to remain in a nonintegrated setting
